page.description: The BITMAP_TO_PALETTE_PNG() function converts a Windows bitmap (BMP) image to Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format.
page.syntax: PNG as B = BITMAP_TO_PALETTE_PNG(B bitmap_data[,C pallette[,C transparent_colors[,C Background_color]]])

argument.name: PNG
argument.description: The new PNG image as a blob variable.

argument.name: bitmap_data
argument.description: The input BMP image as a blob variable.

argument.name: pallette
argument.description: Optional. The list of colors to be used.

argument.name: transparent_colors
argument.description: Optional list of colors that will be transparent. Character.

page.example: dim ff as P dim bb as B dim cc as C ff = file.open("C:\Documents\Xbasic Reference\Images\logo.bmp",FILE_RO_EXCLUSIVE) bb = ff.readb(100000) cc = bitmap_to_palette_png(bb)
